abstract: Advanced Micro Devices reports better-than-expected third quarter results, and predicts higher fourth quarter revenue on emerging market sales; profit is $97 million.
snippet: The chip company also forecast higher fourth-quarter revenue because it expects to have strong sales in emerging markets.
lead_paragraph: The chip company also forecast higher fourth-quarter revenue because it expects to have strong sales in emerging markets.

headline.main: Profit at Advanced Micro Devices Exceeds Expectations After Year-Earlier Loss
headline.print_headline: Profit at Advanced Micro Devices Exceeds Expectations After Year-Earlier Loss
